# BFASST Project Environment Variables Pre-generated by Makefile
# Changes to this file will NOT persist across a fresh install. setup/env/general.env for persistence.
# Do NOT put any multiline commands in this file. Expected format is a valid shell variable name, an equal sign, then any vaild shell code on the same line.
# Empty lines and lines starting with # (comments) are ignored.
# Vars are exported with . .venv/bin/activate, and then reverted to previous values or unset with deactivate
